listeningQuestion.question: What did the woman steal from the shop?
listeningQuestion.translation: 这位女士从商店偷了什么？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个关于商店盗窃的故事，揭示了现代社会中诚信缺失的问题。课文使用了比较状语从句和一些重要的语法结构，如'as...as...'的否定形式等。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: People are not so honest as they once were.
The temptation to steal is greater than ever before--especially in large shops.
A detective recently watched a well-dressed woman who always went into a large store on Monday mornings.
One Monday, there were fewer people in the shop than usual when the woman came in, so it was easier for the detective to watch her.
The woman first bought a few small articles.
After a little time, she chose one of the most expensive dresses in the shop and handed it to an assistant who wrapped it up for her as quickly as possible.
Then the woman simply took the parcel and walked out of the shop without paying.
When she was arrested, the detective found out that the shop assistant was her daughter.
The girl 'gave' her mother a free dress once a week!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 人们不再像以前那样诚实了。
偷窃的诱惑力比以往任何时候都更强烈——特别是在大的商店里。
一名侦探最近注意上了一位穿着讲究的妇女，她总是在星期一上午进入一家大商场。
有一个星期一，当这位妇女走进这家商场时，里面的人比往常少，因此，侦探比较容易监视她。
这位妇女先是买了几样小商品。
过了一会儿，她又选了商场里最昂贵的一件衣服，把它递给了售货员。那售货员以最快的速度为她包好了衣服。
然后，那妇女拿过包就走出了商场，根本没有付钱。
她被逮捕后，侦探发现原来那售货员是她的女儿。
那姑娘每星期'送'她母亲一件免费的衣服！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.title: 比较状语从句
content: 比较状语从句含有或暗含'与……相比'的意思，包括as...as..., not so/as...as..., less...than...等结构。
例如：People are not so honest as they once were.
当句子里两个动词相同、时态也一样时，第二个动词可以省略。

notes.title: little和few的用法
content: little和a little与不可数名词一起使用，few和a few与复数可数名词连用。
little表示否定，a little表示肯定。
例如：After a little time (表示过了一会儿)

notes.title: A和One的用法
content: 不定冠词a通常用于表示不确定的人或事物，one强调'一个'的意思。
例如：One Monday (用于故事开头时)，表示某一个星期一。

notes.context: 用于比较两者之间的相同程度
notes.example: People are not so honest as they once were.
She handed it to an assistant.
The detective found out that the shop assistant was her daughter.
The girl 'gave' her mother a free dress once a week.

multipleChoice.question: Why was it easier for the detective to watch the woman that Monday?
options: Because there were more people than usual
Because there were fewer people than usual
Because the detective knew her daughter
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文中提到'there were fewer people in the shop than usual'，所以侦探更容易监视她。

multipleChoice.question: What did the woman steal from the shop?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文中提到女人偷了'one of the most expensive dresses'。

multipleChoice.question: How often did the daughter give her mother a free dress?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文最后一句提到'The girl gave her mother a free dress once a week'。

notes.title: 社会话题探讨
notes.content: 本课通过一个商店盗窃案例，反映了现代社会中的诚信问题。故事揭示了即使是看似体面的人也可能做出不诚实的行为，以及家庭关系可能被用于不法行为。

notes.title: 写作特点
notes.content: 文章采用了叙事性的写作手法，通过具体的故事情节展现主题。作者使用了大量的比较结构和时间状语，使故事的发展更加清晰。

notes.title: 语言特点
notes.content: 课文中使用了多个比较结构，如'not so...as...'、'greater than ever before'等，这些结构在英语中经常用于比较过去和现在的状况。
